about.details:
Shigan Quantum Technologies is engaged in the business of designing, developing, manufacturing, and assembling Alternate Fuel Systems i.e. LNG, CNG, and Hydrogen Fuel Kit Systems. Since April 2020, the business has ventured into Fire Detection & Alarm systems.

It manufactures Alternate Fuel Systems for high duty & light-duty vehicles power generation equipment, industrial equipment, and off-highway applications. It exports CNG fuel systems to countries such as New Jersey, Sweden, Canada, Australia, and Italy.

Competitive strengths

  • Highly experienced managerial team.
  • Standard quality standards and assurance.
  • Export to overseas countries i.e. Australia, Sweden, Canada, etc.
  • A strong relationship with suppliers.

faqs.question: What is the Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 4539000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹22.70 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹50 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on February 28, 2022, and closes on March 3, 2022.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO will be done on Tuesday, March 8, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, March 10, 2022. Check the Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Shigan Quantum Technologies IPO listing date is on Friday, March 11, 2022.
